checkcasepermission.name: CheckCasePermission
checkcasepermission.description: Grants permission to verify whether the caller has the permissions to perform support case operations

createcase.name: CreateCase
createcase.description: Grants permission to create a support case

getcase.name: GetCase
getcase.description: Grants permission to describe a support case in your account

getcases.name: GetCases
getcases.description: Grants permission to list the support cases in your account

updatecase.name: UpdateCase
updatecase.description: Grants permission to update a support case
